General.Name: Koleksiyon Mobilya Sanayi AS
General.Description: Koleksiyon Mobilya Sanayi A.S. designs, manufactures, and sells home and office furniture products in Turkey and internationally. The company offers poufs, sideboards, cabinets, coffee tables, sofas and armchairs, nightstands and dressers, closets, buffets, chairs and tools, tables group, desks, book cases and shelfs, working cabinets, TV units, dining tables, dividers and screens, work stations, and accessories, as well as storage, bedroom furniture, lighting, and home textile products. Its products are used in public spaces, corporate, education, finance, health, IT and communication, residential, tourism, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Cumhuriyet Mah. Haci Osman Bayiri Cad., Istanbul, Turkey, 34457
